title: Coverlet fragments
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: double cloth
description: In navy wool and cream cotton, large ornate pattern of acanthus pillars framing large rosettes, with thistles and branches and some diaper filling. Fragment "a" shows part of a border of plain houses flanked by small trees, and in right corner, small boat in profile, with "Year 1840." Reversible, with colors in interchanged positions.
name: Coverlet fragments
